group_1.textRight: Don’t worry, we didn't wait much at all.
Are you sure you didn't want us to help?

group_1.textLeft: Of course not, you're our guests.

group_1.textRight: You seem quite at home here.
I guess you've completely gotten used to living@in this place, then?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, there isn't much to get used to; I used@to drop by Suitoku Temple every now and then.
'Cause they're my relatives, and I've also been@to Kamihama to hunt Witches before.

group_1.textRight: If not for that, you've still been coming here to@play since you were little.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, good evening, Priest!
Once again, I would like to express my gratitude@to the Chief Priest,
for letting us use such an excellent temple as@our base.

group_1.textRight: It is my honour to be of service to the head family.

group_1.textLeft: That’s enough of that... [chara:305801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:305801:motion_200][chara:305801:lipSynch_1]Ta-dah!
Tonight's dinner!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Wow! It's grilled meat!

group_1.textLeft: Yup, gotta eat meat to grow stronger!

group_1.textRight: No matter how many times I think about it... your@cooking is always a far cry from Buddhist cuisine...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not a monk at all, so who cares? It's fine.
Plus, I don't really like Buddhist food, it lacks@flavour...

group_1.textRight: Divine punishment awaits you!
But grilling meat while a Buddhist Priest has a@vegetarian meal next to us...

group_1.textLeft: It's a little awkward...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it!
Nothing quite like a traditional vegetarian meal@with the smell of grilled meat to go alongside it!

group_1.textLeft: Divine punishment awaits you, too!

group_1.textCenter: Well, now that we've gotten your permission@to be divinely punished...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yummy!

group_1.textRight: You're eating a lot, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: There’s nothing better than having meat after@nearly starving to death.

group_1.textRight: Starving... to death...?

group_1.textLeft: I see, I guess no matter how rich you are,@it happens.

group_1.textRight: Does it... really?
Did something happen to you...?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, I just made a teensy blunder, that's all.
Since I decided tonight's dinner would be@grilled meat,
I skipped breakfast and lunch so I could eat as@much as possible.
But then, on my way back, I met a Witch.
All that energy I used up on that Witch ruined@the plans I'd made for my stomach.

group_1.textRight: Stomach plans... You leave me speechless...
And, were you alright?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there was a Magical Girl who fought along@with me.
She gave me a bread roll.
That got my belly back on track.

group_1.textRight: You must’ve been grateful to that girl...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, she's my saviour.
I can't thank her enough. I wanna meet her again.

group_1.textRight: What was she like?

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, the great detective’s offering to help me@find her?

group_1.textRight: It’s the Todoroki Kouichi in me...!

group_1.textLeft: Well, let's see...
Her legs... they were gorgeous. The muscles@were perfectly toned, and...

group_1.textRight: Legs...
Perhaps she's an athlete?

group_1.textLeft: She did tell me she does track...
Oh, yeah, and the weird thing is, she wasn't@wearing any shoes.
Do you walk down the street barefoot, like that,@on track teams...?
Also, she looked oddly sluggish and tired...
Come to think of it, she was yawning too...@maybe she's sleep-deprived...
...everything 'bout her bugs me somehow.

group_1.textRight: Sleep-deprived... barefoot...
That sounds like...

group_1.textLeft: It's possible that she's suffering from... bullying...

group_1.textRight: Hiding shoes and the like is a fairly clichéd@method of bullying...

group_1.textLeft: What?! She's being bullied?!
I won’t stand idly by!! That girl is my saviour!

group_1.textRight: Ryouko! Do you remember that girl's uniform?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I don't know what school she goes to,@but I know exactly what her uniform looks like!

group_1.textRight: Aren't you being hasty? I think we should be@careful...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry, I'm not gonna cause any trouble!
